title: Frequently Asked Questions - GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

content.page_title: Frequently Asked Questions - GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum

faq_entries.question: How do I use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faq_entries.answer: Apply 2–3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning.

faq_entries.question: What is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faq_entries.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum provides brightening and fades dark spots.

faq_entries.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum safe to use?
faq_entries.answer: This product is formulated for Oily, Combination. Mild tingling for sensitive skin. We recommend a patch test before full application.

faq_entries.question: How long does it take to see results from GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faq_entries.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum helps with brightening, fades dark spots.

faq_entries.question: What are the key ingredients in GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faq_entries.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum combines the power of Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid.

faq_entries.question: Is GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum suitable for oily skin?
faq_entries.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is suitable for oily, combination skin types.

faq_entries.question: What is the price of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faq_entries.answer: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is priced at ₹699. Premium quality at a reasonable price with 2 active ingredients

faq_entries.question: How does GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum compare to other serums?
faq_entries.answer: For detailed comparisons, please see our comparison page.
